sentences.sContent: New genes emerge as dominant, no longer recessive or latent, and organisms change.
sentences.sContent_eng: New genes emerge as dominant, no longer recessive or latent, and organisms change.
sentences.sCn: 新的基因出现并支配，不在隐性潜伏，然后生物就突变了。

sentences.sContent: Eye colour is inherited, however brown eyes are dominant across the world while blue eyes are a recessive trait.
sentences.sContent_eng: Eye colour is inherited, however brown eyes are dominant across the world while blue eyes are a recessive trait.
sentences.sCn: 眼睛的颜色是天生的，世界上褐色眼睛占主导地位，而蓝色眼睛是一种隐性特征。

sentences.sContent: The reports said blond hair was caused by a recessive gene, so both sides of the family have to have it to extend the shade into the next generation.
sentences.sContent_eng: The reports said blond hair was caused by a recessive gene, so both sides of the family have to have it to extend the shade into the next generation.
sentences.sCn: 报道中说金发是由一种隐性基因造成，因此只有在家庭中的双方都携带这种基因的情况下这种发色才能遗传给下一代。

words.tran: （礼拜仪式后牧师及唱诗班退场时所唱的）退场赞美诗

trans.tranOther: a recessive  gene  is passed to children from their parents only if both parents have the gene
